message.body: It's good...lonely. Boring. I'm not good at making food. I haven't started work (I start Monday) so I haven't been doing much. How are you? :)
Haha I'm pretty sure "it's lonely and I'm not good at making food" are pretty standard observations about the post college real world. All moved in at least? I'm good, super excited for pride!!

Hahaha true. I feel less alone now in my loneliness. Someone just told me how to make chicken with wine so that's good. Yeahhh pride!!! Are you going to DC pride? Yep I am all moved in. Except the things Lizzy is bringing. And Lizzy. I'm so glad I won't be lonely forever!
Yup, so excited. And I'm so jealous you guys are living together. How've you been entertaining yourself these past few days then?

Also, this is definitely my favorite easy recipe. If you like sweet potatoes you should definitely try it: http://brokeassgourmet.com/articles/mashed-sweet-potatoes-with-goat-cheese-rosemary-and-olive-oil :)
